revised_title: Approximate Solution for the Bending of a Beam of Rectangular Cross-Section under Any System of Load
tldr: The author presents an approximate solution for the bending of a beam of rectangular cross-section under various load systems, focusing on concentrated or discontinuous loading. The study investigates the elastic equilibrium of a long bar and provides solutions for different cases, including the effects of external stresses, total tension, total shear, and total bending moment.
